Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/73rd
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are rerouted in both directions: due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions: 

Northbound via Jeffery, 73rd, Yates, 71st, Jeffery, and resume normal route.
Southbound via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery and resume normal route due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-BOUND Blue trains bypassing Irving Park
ShortDescription: Forest Park Bound Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Irving Park due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park Bound Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Irving Park due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: O'Hare- Bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Irving Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare- Bound Blue Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare- Bound Blue Line trains are standing at Irving Park due to police activity.

Shuttles buses have been requested from Harlem-O'Hare Branch to Racine to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
